markdownRemark.html:
Ciao Mondo!

What's better than keeping conventions for the first post?

That's why you can read "Ciao Mondo", which is the italian translation of "Hello World". Welcome.

frontmatter.title: Hello World
frontmatter.excerpt: What's better than keeping conventions for the first post?

Ciao Mondo, la vendetta!

What's better than keeping conventions for the second post as well?

Welcome, again.
